item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Taiwanese so there will be some Chinese articles if I don’t know how to properly express them in English. Feel free to leave message or email me via kai.chihkaiyu[at]gmail.com. Here are some skill keywords I have: Environment Linux Docker Language Python Golang Services: MySQL Kafka GitLab GitLab CI Prometheus Jenkins Elasticsearch OpenTSDB
